column1: #Text=Aang says : " I 'm sorry for running away . "
#Text=" Katara says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't want to talk about it .
#Text=" Katara says : " It has to do with your dream , does n't it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , it 's kind of a long story .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm going to try to get a little fire going .
